amendment.description: To make available from Procurement, Defense-Wide, up to $12,6000,000 for the completion of the final phase of a certain intelligence activity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4860 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4860 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S8703-8705; text: CR S8704) To make available from Procurement, Defense-Wide, up to $12,6000,000 for the completion of the final phase of a certain intelligence activity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4860 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Mikulski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4860 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
